description:
In this course, we dive deep into The Internet of Things - the new generation of network aware things.

If you visit your local home renovation or electronics store, you are likely to see:

  • Fitness bands, and sleep trackers
  • Dog activity tags
  • Electronic soccer balls
  • Smart watches
  • Internet-connected light bulbs

In this course, we'll look at these items in the context of how they enhance our lives. And we'll talk about the reality of privacy and security in this age where everything we touch tracks us.
title: The Internet of Things IoT 2016
